Authors:
Debora Cervieri Guterres, Maria D.M. Santos, JOSE CARMINE
DIANESE, Erica Santos Carmo Souza
Title:
New trichomatous coelomycete on Myrcia fenzliana from the
Brazilian Cerrado
Keywords:
Brazil, Cerrado fungi, Pleosporalean fungi,
Phaeosphaeriaceae,
Abstract:
We describe a trichomatous pycnidial coelomycete showing
characteristically very large conidiomata and conidia. The fungus is
here described and presented as a new genus because of its unique size
and general morphology, confirmed by multilocus phylogenetic
analyses.
